effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to toss a stashed pocket grenade, dealing 100,963 Fire damage split between all enemies caught in the blast.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.1 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 2,935 Haste for 12 sec.
Equip: Taking damage has a high chance to brand your assailant dealing 105,835 Holy Fire damage and healing you for 50% of damage dealt.
Equip: You champion the cause of Huojin Pandaren.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Slightly Singed Arathi Tabard
